verses.translation: In order to keep up with them, I imitated their looks and exterior
So I became someone else, just to boast

verses.text: وظننت أنا أني بذلك حزت غنى
verses.translation: And I thought that through that I'd gained a fortune
But I found that I'd lost, for these are mere appearances

verses.text: لا لا لا نحتاج المال كي نزداد جمالا
verses.translation: No, no, we don't need wealth in order to increase in beauty
verses.transliteration: LA LA LA NAHTAJ ALMAL KAY NAZDAD JAMALAN

verses.translation: Our essence is here, in our hearts it shines

verses.text: لا لا نرضي الناس بما لا نرضاه لنا حالا
verses.translation: No, no, we will not seek to please others with that which we deem to unbefitting for ourselves
verses.transliteration: LA LA NURDI ALNAAS BIMA LA NARDAH LANA HALAN

verses.translation: That is our beauty, rising and ascending above
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Be yourself and you will increase in beauty
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Be yourself and you will increase in beauty
I accept people but I don't imitate them
Except for what I agree with, to satisfy myself

verses.text: سأكون أنا مثلي تمامًا هذا أنا
verses.translation: I will just be myself, just the way I am, this is me
My conviction suffices, this is my certainty

verses.text: لا لا لا نحتاج المال كي نزداد جمالا
verses.translation: No, no, we don't need wealth in order to increase in beauty
verses.transliteration: LA LA LA NAHTAJ ALMAL KAY NAZDAD JAMALAN

verses.translation: Our essence is here, in our hearts it shines

verses.text: لا لا نرضي الناس بما لا نرضاه لنا حالا
verses.translation: No, no, we will not seek to please others with that which we deem to unbefitting for ourselves
verses.transliteration: LA LA NURDI ALNAAS BIMA LA NARDAH LANA HALAN

verses.translation: That is our beauty, rising and ascending above
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Be yourself and you will increase in beauty
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
I'll be what I please to be
I won't seek their acceptance
I'll be whom I love to be
Why would I care about their acceptance?

verses.text: سأكون أنا (سأكون أنا) من أرضى أنا (من أرضى أنا)
verses.translation: I'll be what I please to be
I won't seek their acceptance
I'll be whom I love to be
I will not accept their acceptance

verses.text: لا لا لا نحتاج المال كي نزداد جمالا
verses.translation: No, no, we don't need wealth in order to increase in beauty
verses.transliteration: LA LA LA NAHTAJ ALMAL KAY NAZDAD JAMALAN

verses.translation: Our essence is here, in our hearts it shines

verses.text: لا لا نرضي الناس بما لا نرضاه لنا حالا
verses.translation: No, no, we will not seek to please others with that which we deem to unbefitting for ourselves
verses.transliteration: LA LA NURDI ALNAAS BIMA LA NARDAH LANA HALAN

verses.translation: That is our beauty, rising and ascending above
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Be yourself and you will increase in beauty
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Oh wo oh... Oh wo oooh
Be yourself and you will increase in beauty

verses.text: أيا من يدعى الفهم إلى كم يا أخا الوهم
verses.translation: Oh you who claims to understand. Oh brother, how long will you be deluded?
verses.transliteration: AYA MAN YADDA'I AL-FAHM ILA KAM YA AKHA AL-WAHM

verses.text: تعبي الذنب والذم وتخطي الخطأ الجم
verses.translation: You tire yourself with sin and disgrace. You make mistake after mistake.
verses.transliteration: TU'ABBI AL-DHANB WA AL-DHAMM WA TUKHTI AL-KHATA' AL-JAMM

verses.text: أما بان لك العيب أما أنذرك الشيب
verses.translation: Don't you feel ashamed? Hasn't your old age warned you?
verses.transliteration: AMA BANAN LAK AL-'AYB AMA ANDHARAKA AL-SHEEB

verses.text: وما في نصحه ريب ولا سمعك قد صم
verses.translation: For certainly there is no doubt about it's advice. Rather, you have chosen to be deaf.
verses.transliteration: WA MA FI NUS'HIH RAYB WA LA SAM'UKA QAD SAM

verses.text: أما نادى بك الموت أما أسمعك الصوت
verses.translation: Hasn't Death Called you? Have you not heard the voice?
verses.transliteration: AMA NADA BIKA AL-MAWT AMA ASMA'AKA AL-SAWT

verses.text: أما تخشى من الفوت فتحطاط وتهتم
verses.translation: Are you not afraid your time is running out? So be warned and take heed.
verses.transliteration: AMA TAKHSHA MIN AL-FAWT FATAH'TAAT WA TAHTAM

verses.text: فكم تسدر في السهو وتختال من الزهو
verses.translation: For how dizzy are you in heedlessness.
verses.transliteration: FAKAM TASDAR FI AL-SAHW WA TAKHTALU MIN AL-ZAHW

verses.text: وتنصب إلى اللهو كأن الموت ما عم
verses.translation: As you strut in arrogance.
verses.transliteration: WA TANSABBU ILA AL-LAHW KA'ANN AL-MAWTA MA 'AM

verses.translation: And you focus on having fun.
verses.transliteration: WA HATTAM TAJAFIK WA IBTA'U TALAFIK

verses.text: طباعًا جمعت فيك عيوبا شملها انضم
verses.translation: As if death is a myth.

verses.text: إذا اسخطت مولاك فما تقلق من ذاك
verses.translation: You challenge the inevitable.
verses.transliteration: IDHA ASKHAT MAWLAAK FAMA TAQLAQ MIN DHAK

verses.text: وإن أخفق مسعاك تلظيت من الهم
verses.translation: You slack in avoiding the flows you naturally carry.
verses.transliteration: WA IN AKHFAKAT MAS'AK TALAZAYTA MIN AL-HAM

verses.text: وإن لاح لك النقش من الأصفر تهتش
verses.translation: When you anger your Lord.
verses.transliteration: WA IN LAHA LAK AL-NAQSH MIN AL-ASFAR TAHTASH

verses.text: وإن مر بك النعش تغاممت ولا غم
verses.translation: You feel no anxiety for that.
verses.transliteration: WA IN MARRA BIKA AL-NA'ASH TAGHAMAMT WA LA GHAM

verses.translation: But if your worldly efforts fail.
verses.transliteration: TU'AASI AL-NASIHA AL-BARR WA TA'TAAS WA TAZAWARR

verses.text: وتنقاد لمن غر ومن مان ومن نم
verses.translation: You burn in worry.
verses.transliteration: WA TANQADU LI MAN GHAR WA MAN MANA WA MAN NAM

verses.text: وتسعى في هوى النفس وتحتال على الفلس
verses.translation: You defy the righteous who advises you.
verses.transliteration: WA TAS'AA FI HAWA AL-NAFS WA TAHTALU 'ALA AL-FALS

verses.text: وتنسى ظلمة الرمس ولا تذكر ما ثم
verses.translation: In disobedience and negligence.
verses.transliteration: WA TANSA ZULMATA AL-RAMS WA LA TADKURU MA THAM

verses.text: ولو لاحظك الحظ لما طاح بك اللحظ
verses.translation: However you are pressured by those heedless.
verses.transliteration: WA LAW LAHADHAK AL-HADH LAMA TAAHA BIKA AL-LAHDH

verses.text: ولا كنت إذا الوعظ جلا الأحزان تغتم
verses.translation: Those who lie and deceive you.
verses.transliteration: WA LA KUNTA IDHA AL-WA'ADH JALA AL-AHZAN TAGHTAM

verses.text: ستذري الدم لا الدمع إذا عاينت لا جمع
verses.translation: As you move according to your own desires.
verses.transliteration: SATUDHRI AL-DAMA LA AL-DAM' IDHA 'AYAN LA JAM'

verses.text: يقي في عرصة الجمع ولا خال ولا عم
verses.translation: Seeking any means to obtain wealth.
verses.transliteration: YAQI FI 'ARSATA AL-JAM' WA LA KHAL WA LA 'AM

verses.text: كأني بك تنحط إلى اللحد وتنغط
verses.translation: And you forget the darkness of the coffin.
verses.transliteration: KA'ANNI BIKA TANAHAT ILA AL-LAHD WA TANGHAT

verses.text: وقد أسلمك الرهط إلى أضيق من سم
verses.translation: And you do not ponder what will take place there.
verses.transliteration: WA QAD ASLAMAK AL-RAHAT ILA ADYAQA MIN SAM

verses.translation: Only if you are fortunate enough.
verses.transliteration: HUNAK AL-JISMU MAMDUD LI YASTA'KILAHU AL-DUD

verses.text: إلى أن ينخر العود ويمسي العظم قد رم
verses.translation: To get your share of guidance.
verses.transliteration: ILA AN YANKHARA AL-'UD WA YUMSI AL-'AZMU QAD RAM

verses.text: ومن بعد فلا بد من العرض إذا أعتد
verses.translation: But you were not of those who cry saddened in regret when the warning came.
verses.transliteration: WA MIN BA'DU FALA BUD MIN AL-'ARD IDHA 'UTID

verses.text: صراط جسره مد على النار لمن أم
verses.translation: You will cry blood! not tears!
verses.transliteration: SIRATUN JASRUHU MUD 'ALA AL-NAR LI MAN 'AM

verses.text: فكم من مرشد ضل ومن ذي عزة ذل
verses.translation: When you see the reality and there will be no uncle or aunt to save you.
verses.transliteration: FAKAM MIN MURSHID DALL WA MIN DHI 'IZZATIN DHALL

verses.text: وكم من عالم زل وقال الخطب قد طم
verses.translation: It is as if I am with you descending, to the grave as you are covered.
verses.transliteration: WA KAM MIN 'ALIM ZALL WA QALA AL-KHATBU QAD TAM

verses.text: فبادر أيها الغمر لما يحلو به المر
verses.translation: And your family leave you be, to a place narrower than a small hole.
verses.transliteration: FABADIR AYYUHA AL-GHUMR LIMA YAHLU BIHI AL-MURR

verses.text: فقد كاد يهي العمر وما اقلعت عن ذم
verses.translation: And there lays an extended body, only to be eaten by worms.
verses.transliteration: FAQAD KAD YAHI AL-'UMR WA MA AQLA'TA 'AN DHAM

verses.text: ولا تركن إلى الدهر وإن لان وإن سر
verses.translation: That keeps gnawing constantly, until your bones decay.
verses.transliteration: WA LA TARKAN ILA AL-DAHR WA IN LANA WA IN SARR

verses.text: فتلفى كمن أغتر بأفعى تنفث السم
verses.translation: After that your actions must be shown, then over a path whose bring is over the burning fire.
verses.transliteration: FATU'LFU KAM MAN AGH'TARR BI AF'A TINFUTHU AL-SUM

verses.text: وخفض من تراقيك فإن الموت لاقيك
verses.translation: For how many guided one became misguided and for how many mighty ones were disgraced.
verses.transliteration: WA KHAFFAD MIN TARAQIK FA INN AL-MAWTA LAQIK

verses.text: وسار في تراقيك وما ينكل إن هم
verses.translation: And how many scholars ere, saying. "This trust is Overwhelming!"
verses.transliteration: WA SARI FI TARAQIK WA MA YANKULU IN HAM

verses.text: وجانب صعر الخد إذا ساعدك الجد
verses.translation: So oh heedless one, hasten, to the one who constantly blesses you.
verses.transliteration: WA JANIB SA'ARA AL-KHAD IDHA SA'ADAKA AL-JAD

verses.text: وزم اللفظ إن ند فما أسعد من زم
verses.translation: For your time is almost up yet you cease to give up sinning.
verses.transliteration: WA ZUM AL-LAFDH IN NAD FA MA AS'ADA MAN ZAM

verses.text: ونفس عن أخي البث وصدقه إذا نث
verses.translation: So do not be fooled by time, even if you are pleased and are delighted.
verses.transliteration: WA NAFFIS 'AN AKHI AL-BATH WA SADDIQHU IDHA NATH

verses.text: ورم العمل الرث فقد أفلح من رم
verses.translation: For you being deceived, you will be attacked by a snake that sprouts venom in your grave.
verses.transliteration: WA RUM AL-'AMALA AL-RATH FAQAD AFLAHA MAN RAM

verses.text: ورش من ريشه انحص بما عم وما خص
verses.translation: So humble yourself to whoever you meet, for indeed death will meet you soon.
verses.transliteration: WA RISH MAN RAYSHUHU ANHAS BIMA 'AMM WA MA KHAS

verses.text: ولا تأس على النقص ولا تحرص على اللم
verses.translation: And don't mind if they annoy you.
verses.transliteration: WA LA TA'AS 'ALA AL-NAQS WA LA TAHRIS 'ALA AL-LAM

verses.text: وعاد الخلق الرذل وعود كفك البذل
verses.translation: Be with those who are humble if you truly seek help, and watch what you say in anger: for those who mind their tonge are happiest.
verses.transliteration: WA 'ADI AL-KHULUQA AL-RADHL WA 'AWWID KAFFAKA AL-BADHL

verses.text: ولا تستمع العذل ونزعها عن الضم
verses.translation: And help your brothers in distress and do actions with excellence for he succeeds whose actions are excellent.
verses.transliteration: WA LA TASMA'I AL-'ADHL WA NAZZHAHA 'ANI AL-DAM

verses.text: وزود نفسك الخير ودع ما يعقب الضير
verses.translation: And give what you can to those who don't have, and do not worry over poverty and what you do not have.
verses.transliteration: WA ZAWWID NAFSAKA AL-KHAYR WA DA' MA YU'QIBU AL-DAYR

verses.text: وهيئ مركب السير وخف من لجة اليم
verses.translation: And be an enemy to manners of miserliness, instead open your hand and give, and do not listen those who blame you for giving, and stay far from greediness.
verses.transliteration: WA HAYYI' MARKABA AL-SAYR WA KHAF MIN LUJJATI AL-YAM

verses.text: بذا أوصيك يا صاح وقد بحت كمن باح
verses.translation: And increase in good and leave off that which leads to the place of torment, and stay away from desires and doubts, for that will take you far.
verses.transliteration: BIDHA UWSIIK YA SAH WA QAD BUHTU KAMAN BAH

verses.translation: So with this I advise you brother as you enemy would want death for you, so be the one to take it and act upon it.
verses.transliteration: FATUBA LIFATAN RAH BI ADABI YA'TAM

verses.translation: O Callers Of Lord Of Heaven,
O You Who Made Light On Earth,
verses.transliteration: YA MAN SANA’TUM FI AL-ARD NURA

verses.translation: O Hearts In Which there is Loyalty,
Today You Are Blessed With Happiness
Welcome In Word And Tone,
verses.transliteration: AHLAN WA SAHLAN, QAWLAN WA LAHNA

verses.translation: We Have All The Respect For You.
You Built, You Planted,
With Love For All People.
O Callers Of Lord Of Heaven,
O You Who Made Light On Earth,
verses.transliteration: YA MAN SANA’TUM FI AL-ARD NURA

verses.translation: O Hearts In Which there is Loyalty,
Today You Are Blessed With Happiness
Our Media Has Shone With Truth,
In Your Pursuit For Peace.
It Was A Beginning Until The End,
In Your Hearts, The Words Are True.
O Callers Of Lord Of Heaven,
O You Who Made Light On Earth,
verses.transliteration: YA MAN SANA’TUM FI AL-ARD NURA

verses.translation: O Hearts In Which there is Loyalty,
Today You Are Blessed With Happiness
You Have Contributed To Spreading Goodness,
Like The Clouds And The Rain.
May God Bless You Always,
You Have Achieved The Media Generation
O Callers Of Lord Of Heaven,
O You Who Made Light On Earth,
verses.transliteration: YA MAN SANA’TUM FI AL-ARD NURA

verses.translation: O Hearts In Which there is Loyalty,
Today You Are Blessed With Happiness
The beauty of existence is remembering Allah
Then life becomes pure with his guidance of light
verses.transliteration: WA TASAFU ALHAYAH BI NUR HADAH

verses.translation: The beauty of existence is remembering Allah
Then life becomes pure with his guidance of light
verses.transliteration: WA TASAFU ALHAYAH BI NUR HADAH

verses.translation: And the soul becomes assured in His obedience
Then happiness reaches its utmost peak
A heart full of passion for its Lord
Which loves to satisfy Him and to meet Him
Keeps returning to the sublimity of prayer
For him, it’s his home and all that he wants
verses.transliteration: QARAR WA YASMO WA DHA MABTAGHAH

verses.translation: Not any amusement can divert him from his march
Nor collecting wealth can blind his eyes
When the caller calls towards success
You see him walk towards it, answering the call
You see him walk towards it, answering the call
The beauty of existence is remembering Allah
Then life becomes pure with his guidance of light
verses.transliteration: WA TASAFU ALHAYAH BI NUR HADAH

verses.translation: The beauty of existence is remembering Allah
Then life becomes pure with his guidance of light
verses.transliteration: WA TASAFU ALHAYAH BI NUR HADAH

verses.translation: And the soul becomes assured in His obedience
Then happiness reaches its utmost peak
Whispering: “O my Lord, o forgiver of sins”
Your pardon is what I seek and nothing else
And tears that drip on Your book
By which Allah removes the sins
That's how a sound heart should beat
Towards Allah, it always keeps returning

verses.text: فيا سعد من كان ذا همة
verses.translation: How happy is he who has a high aim
verses.transliteration: FAYA SAD MAN KAN DHA HIMMAH

verses.translation: To paradise in the highest of heavens
To paradise in the highest of heavens
The beauty of existence is remembering Allah
Then life becomes pure with his guidance of light
verses.transliteration: WA TASAFU ALHAYAH BI NUR HADAH

verses.translation: The beauty of existence is remembering Allah
Then life becomes pure with his guidance of light
verses.transliteration: WA TASAFU ALHAYAH BI NUR HADAH

verses.translation: And the soul becomes assured in His obedience
Then happiness reaches its utmost peak
